name: ArmPG
description:
On our Twitch stream, we're prototyping a game a month - and this is the result of the first month!

In this game, you are an arm that has lost the rest of its body. You've happened upon a dungeon full of spiders - who just happen to be hoarding all your lost body parts!

To play

Keyboard:

  • WASD or arrow keys to control the movement/slash direction of the arm
  • spacebar to dash
  • j to jump

Gamepad:

  • left stick to control the movement/slash direction of the arm
  • button 1 to dash
  • button 2 to jump

Keep in mind - this is a prototype, so it's not a complete game!  There are three levels, so kill the spiders and win your body parts back!

We're working on more games - follow our Twitch stream if you want to see us develop live!
